body.name: GAP babyGap Classic Side-by-Side Double Stroller - Lightweight Double Stroller with Recline, Extendable Sun Visors & Compact Fold - Made with Sustainable Materials, Black Camo
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 3 hrs 36 mins
features: SMOOTHEST RIDE: Swivel front wheels feature precision technology for outstanding control and effortless push--glide, turn and maneuver any surface | Locking back brakes | Puncture-proof 6-inch and 7-inch tires are durable and shock absorbing

SUSTAINABLE MATERIALS: All soft surfaces/fabrics on the stroller are made from recycled water bottles | Plastic drinking bottles are sorted, cleaned and shredded into flakes that become the yarn the seat fabric is made from

UNIQUELY GAP BABY: Easily recognized Baby Gap logos and iconic Brannan Bear icons create an elevated look | Each seat has 3 recline positions | Ergonomic leatherette handlebars | 2 oversized canopies with extendable sun visors

LIGHTWEIGHT & COMPACT: Stroller weighs 23 lbs. | Compact umbrella fold, auto lock and carry handle make it easy to transport | Assembled dims: 29.7”W x 35.5"D x 42.4"H | Folded dims: 13.4"W x 38.9”D x 8.4"H | Fits through standard doorways

TONS OF STOAGE: Stroller features extra-large storage pockets and removable parent organizer | JPMA Certified | Two 5-point safety harnesses | Recommended for and 9 months up to 35 lbs. per seat (70 lbs. total)
body.description: Introducing the babyGap Side-by-Side Double Stroller: The most responsibly made lightweight double stroller. Designed for the future in every possible way, all of the stroller’s soft fabric is made of recycled water bottles. Plastic drinking bottles are sorted, cleaned and shredded into flakes that become the yarn the seat fabric is made from. A great choice for your children and the planet, this everyday double stroller is outfitted with front wheels that features precision technology for outstanding control and effortless push, making it easier than ever to glide, turn and maneuver any surface. Incredibly cozy, the stroller has two extra-large extendable canopies, reclining seats and tons of storage. The extra-large storage pockets and removable parent organizer ensure there’s always enough room for your family’s on-the-go essentials. Ideal for travel or everyday use, the stroller’s durable steel frame only weighs 23 pounds and the compact fold, auto lock and carry handle make it easy to transport. Uniquely babyGap, the stroller has leatherette detailing on the handlebars and easily recognized babyGap logos and iconic Brannan Bear on the wheels, canopy, calf rest, parent organizer and safety harness for an elevated look. This double stroller is recommended for infants 9 months up to 35 pounds per seat (70 pounds total).Gap’s first-ever baby gear collection reimagines timeless American style for modern families. Discover quality designs and go-to essentials that instantly refresh your routine. Think super-functional strollers and wagons, elevated patterns, sustainable materials, and more inspired finds for daily life with your little one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a less bulky but high quality stroller for my twins and after extensive searching I found it! I hate how other umbrella strollers have that plastic-like material. This stroller seems to have high quality material. It also has a lot bigger sun shades than other umbrella strollers… so far down that it comes to about my babies’ forehead, yay!. The seats can lay back individually so one baby can sleep and the other can stay sitting up. It folds and unfolds very easily. It is pretty compact when folded. I love the color, very aesthetically pleasing. It was fairly easy to put together. I love the big pockets and attachment that comes with it. My only wish is that it had a lower big compartment to store my diaper bag, and I wish it had a cup holder but the long attachment has dividers so it can hold a drink well. Overall though, I love it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lightweight double stroller
reviews.reviewText: I have Irish twins so finding a double stroller that is compact enough to fit into our SUV but not take up all our trunk space has been quite a challenge... until now. We've been loving the practicality and lightweight design of this double stroller. Folds down super easy, quick, and compact so we can even fit it into a sedan trunk!We have the grey/white color and I absolutely love how clean and aesthetic it looks. Nice handles for the adult and bars for children. Undercarriage space is decent and can definitely accommodate a medium or large diaper bag. Wish the seats reclined more so it was easier for the babies to nap on the-go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I really like it!
reviews.reviewText: The stroller is very compact and folds up to fit in the trunk of our small car which is something that we have been struggling to find in a stroller! The frame is made of strong, sturdy metal that is durable.Assembly was fairly simple and the attachments were easy to attach to the stroller. The stroller has a little bag that attaches to the back, near the handles, which can fit snacks, baby wipes, water bottles, and more. Walking without the extra weight of my backpack has been very nice. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We’ve had this stroller for almost a month now. I bought this one to replace my bulky double stroller for my 1 year old twins that was taking up so much trunk space. I’m only giving it 2 stars because it doesn’t stay latched when folded down and when you remove it from the trunk it just comes out unfolded. The sun visor that’s supposed to hook onto the frame of the stroller in the back doesn’t stay hooked. It still stays up to block the sun but is very annoying because it comes off the hook thing so easily. I’ve made a video That explains all this a little bit better. I do however love all of the storage on this stroller, it’s awesome! It is also very easy to wipe clean! I do also wish that the handle was a full bar, it is quite difficult to steer it with one hand it’s even a little hard to steer with both hands. My bulky Graco double stroller is easier to maneuver. I wouldn’t buy this stroller again, but we’re keeping it because the storage is good and it’s compact.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love love love
reviews.reviewText: We absolutely love this stroller. It works perfectly to go to the zoo or park. It also folds up nicely. I will say one thing is that it doesn’t have the lower storage but the storage carrier on it works great for putting your wallet and the kids sippy cups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So durable and lightweight! Easy to load!!! 🤌🏻✨
reviews.reviewText: We love this double stroller! My toddlers are on the go and we needed something that I could easy load and did not take up much space! We love all the extra features and of course the storage space! ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: El coche esta muy bonito pero hizo falta un tornillo vino sin instrucciones y todo suelto

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect lightweight double stroller!
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect lightweight double stroller! It’s not bulky like many, and it glides along so easily. I don’t feel like I’m using all my strength just to push 2 little ones around. It’s easy to navigate through doorways, too. I also like the shade cover for each seat— it extends far and no complaints here! Also, I love the aesthetic- I have the ‘grey stripes’ color which is so cute for spring/summer coming. It folds nicely and it’s perfect for a neighborhood walk!
